item.title: Go Challenge 2 Review Response
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: My entry to the Go Challenge 2 was reviewed and commented on by the challenge runner. I provide some feedback on his comments.

item.title: Waiting for Ctrl+C in Golang
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: How to wait for the interrupt signal using Golang and command line programs

item.title: Will work for Bitcoin
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: Iâ€™m a big fan of Bitcoin and its backing Blockchain protocol. I really do think it has the potential to allow for much broader uses of distributed control. Wish me luck finding a job in the Bitcoin world.

item.title: Consider using the tap method for code organization
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: The tap method intruduces a new indention block. Consider using the tap method for code organization.

item.title: Avahi helps hosts connect to VMs
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: How to setup Bonjour broadcast to connect your Linux servers to your Macs for easy access while developing. Safari automatically adds the web servers that are broadcasting on your local network. Linux servers will broadcast once the Avahi server is installed.
